name: gamepad-micro
description: Micro library that interfaces with the HTML5 Gamepad API and publishes gamepad update events.

scripts.build: browserify src/gamepad-micro.js -s GamepadMicro > dist/gamepad-micro.js; browserify -t uglifyify src/gamepad-micro.js -s GamepadMicro > dist/gamepad-micro.min.js

author: Chris Dolphin
